name: Sha'ek Mindfa'ek
description: The Broken - A hardened veteran cleric with glowing green eyes. Survived the Smelting ritual, connected to Quori spirit Golos.
personality: Urgent, focused, battle-worn. Moves with purpose and rarely engages in small talk.
backstory: Survived the dangerous Smelting ritual and is connected to a Quori spirit named Golos. Has extensive combat experience.
appearance: Wears heavy chain mail with visible wear and damage from combat. Halflange reddish hair and short wild beard (Scottish warrior style). Carries a large bag the size of a melon and a shield with Ioun's emblem. Eyes glow faintly fluorescent green.

notable_actions.description: Stormed into Professor Artex's meeting room, out of breath and urgent
Prayed to Pelor in the temple and received visions from both Ioun and Quori spirit about sickness and corruption in the spider webs
Rushed out of the temple to warn the party about the danger
Rushed into the farmhouse to help the party during spider attack
Allows the group to choose their own activities.
Rolls dice to determine outcomes for various tasks.
Successfully interrogates Pipira Shimmerlock and gains her trust.
Repeatedly used shield to block attacks.
Successfully blocked an attack with his shield.
Demonstrates the Spirit Shroud ability, causing green aura around him and dealing extra necrotic damage.
Successfully deals damage with Spirit Shroud, though it doesn't cause additional effects.
Commands Furnix to perform a Frigid Howl.
Used Misty Step to observe the situation and identified three creatures attempting to break into a cell.
Chooses to attempt the task of descending through a deck, showcasing initiative and bravery.

memorable_quotes.quote:
Het is mij meer om de roleplay, dat we het serieus nemen. Dan hoeven we niet... We hoeven het niet de roleplay.
Ben je een sleeper agent?
En ben je loyaal aan de academy?
memorable_quotes.context: Sha'ek Mindfa'ek is skeptical of the offered 'casting couch' and proposes using a zone of truth to reveal the truth.

memorable_quotes.quote:
Wat mijn plan is, is in ieder geval om ze allemaal even neer te zetten.
En de zone van de waarheid te casten.
En ze dan eigenlijk gewoon allemaal te vragen.
Recht toe en recht aan.
Ja is...
En als je niet antwoordt is een nee.
En de vraag is eigenlijk gewoon... Ben je... Ben je een sleeper agent?
En ben je loyaal aan de academy?
memorable_quotes.context: Sha'ek suggests using a zone of truth spell on all participants to ensure their answers are truthful regarding their loyalty and intentions.
Sha'ek Mindfa'ek expresses pride and support for Pipira Shimmerlock during her vigilance duty.

memorable_quotes.quote: ‘Je hebt niet zoveel zin om te wisselen. Je kunt gewoon eens wat anders kiezen, maar op het algemeen heb je gewoon een beetje een rol.’
memorable_quotes.context: Sha'ek speaks to Pipira's reluctance to switch roles, showing understanding and flexibility.

memorable_quotes.quote:
De pastor heeft net zijn wacht gehouden.
Hij is niet zo goed opgevallen.
memorable_quotes.context: Sha'ek Mindfa'ek is providing a summary of the recent events involving the pastor and the basher's shift.

memorable_quotes.quote: Nee, dat is waar. Dat is waar.
memorable_quotes.context: Sha'ek Mindfa'ek emphasizes the judicious use of his Inspiration ability, showing maturity and responsibility.

memorable_quotes.quote:
En ik zat in een party, Anne.
Waarvan één van de leden zijn missie was...
Om te saboteren. Om ons te saboteren.
De missie was,
enkleren. Om ons te saboteren.
memorable_quotes.context: Sha'ek Mindfa'ek reveals his past experience with a double-agent to emphasize the seriousness of their current mission.
Sha'ek Mindfa'ek is preparing for a potential attack, reinforcing his battle-ready state with the catchphrase 'Sparta.'

memorable_quotes.quote: Echt niks bijzonders bij, zoals ik daar kan zien.
memorable_quotes.context: Sha'ek downplayed the severity of the situation he observed.

memorable_quotes.quote: Kun je me dat nog even laten zien?
memorable_quotes.context: Sha'ek asks if he can jump through a deck, showing his willingness to act even without full knowledge.
